intro: Ouratea maigualidae, commonly known as the Maigualidae ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Mexico and Panama. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It typically grows in shaded, humid environments such as forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
